languages.text: Когда Лорд-капитан и собранные по дороге офицеры достигают арсенала, окуляры сервочерепа тут же запотевают. По вокс-записи можно разобрать, как Вольный Торговец отдает быстрые хладнокровные приказы казнить тех, кто выполнил идиотский приказ с мостика, и восстановить состояние отсека. Три группы техников тут же отправляются к раскаленным реакторам, а рядовые — к транспортерам боеголовок. Спустя час ситуация приходит в норму.

traits.locale_text: Окуляры сервочерепа запотевают через считанные секунды, однако по вокс-записи можно разобрать, как Вольный Торговец отдает быстрые хладнокровные приказы. Три группы техников тут же отправляются к раскаленным реакторам, чтобы понизить температуру пара в трубах. А рядовые один за другим отправляются к транспортерам боеголовок. Спустя час криков, охов и ахов, запотевшие окуляры приходят в норму. Как и ситуация в арсенале.

languages.text: When the Lord Captain and the officers {mf|he|she} gathered along the way reach the arsenal, the servo-skull's ocular lenses instantly fog over. On the vox-recording, the Rogue Trader issues commands calmly and succinctly — execute those responsible for carrying out the asinine order that came from the bridge and get the compartment sorted. The three technician teams immediately head to the overheated reactors, and the privates to the warhead transporters. An hour later, the situation is back to normal.
languages.original_text: Когда Лорд-капитан и собранные по дороге офицеры достигают арсенала, окуляры сервочерепа тут же запотевают. По вокс-записи можно разобрать, как Вольный Торговец отдает быстрые хладнокровные приказы казнить тех, кто выполнил идиотский приказ с мостика, и восстановить состояние отсека. Три группы техников тут же отправляются к раскаленным реакторам, а рядовые — к транспортерам боеголовок. Спустя час ситуация приходит в норму.

On the vox-recording, the Rogue Trader commands calmly and succinctly — execute those responsible for carrying out the asinine order that came from the bridge and get the module sorted. The three technician groups immediately head to the overheated reactors, and the privates to the warhead transporters. An hour later, the situation is back to normal.

When the Lord Captain and the officers {mf|he|she} gathered along the way reach the arsenal, the servo-skull's ocular lenses instantly fog over. On the vox-recording, the Rogue Trader issues commands calmly and succinctly — execute those responsible for carrying out the asinine order that came from the bridge and get the compartment sorted. The three technician teams immediately head to the overheated reactors, and the privates to the warhead transporters. An hour later, the situation is back to normal.

languages.text: Cuando {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y los oficiales a los que ha reunido por el camino llegan a la armería, las lentes oculares del servocráneo se empañan al instante. En la grabación de voco, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente da órdenes con calma y claridad: ejecutar a los responsables del cumplimiento de las órdenes absurdas que han llegado del puente y poner orden en el compartimento. Los tres equipos de técnicos se dirigen directamente a los reactores sobrecalentados mientras que los soldados van a los transportes de ojivas. Al cabo de una hora, la situación está controlada.
languages.original_text: When the Lord Captain and the officers {mf|he|she} gathered along the way reach the arsenal, the servo-skull's ocular lenses instantly fog over. On the vox-recording, the Rogue Trader issues commands calmly and succinctly — execute those responsible for carrying out the asinine order that came from the bridge and get the compartment sorted. The three technician teams immediately head to the overheated reactors, and the privates to the warhead transporters. An hour later, the situation is back to normal.

traits.locale_text: Cuando {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} y los oficiales a los que ha reunido por el camino llegan a la armería, las lentes oculares del servocráneo se empañan al instante. En la grabación de voco, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente da órdenes con calma y claridad: ejecutar a los responsables del cumplimiento de las órdenes absurdas que han llegado del puente y poner orden en el módulo. Los tres equipos de técnicos se dirigen directamente a los reactores sobrecalentados mientras que los soldados van a los transportes de ojivas. Al cabo de una hora, la situación está controlada.

languages.text: 当领主舰长与{mf|他|她}沿途召集的军官到达军械库时，伺服头骨的目镜突然被雾气一样的东西遮住了。音阵录音显示，行商浪人平静而干练地下达命令，处决了那些执行了来自舰桥的愚蠢命令的船员，并下令让军械库恢复正常。三支技术小组立刻前往过热的反应堆处，士兵们负责处理弹头运输装置。一个小时后，军械库的情况恢复了正常。
languages.original_text: When the Lord Captain and the officers {mf|he|she} gathered along the way reach the arsenal, the servo-skull's ocular lenses instantly fog over. On the vox-recording, the Rogue Trader issues commands calmly and succinctly — execute those responsible for carrying out the asinine order that came from the bridge and get the compartment sorted. The three technician teams immediately head to the overheated reactors, and the privates to the warhead transporters. An hour later, the situation is back to normal.

traits.locale_text: 当领主舰长与{mf|他|她}沿途召集的军官到达军械库时，伺服头骨的目镜突然被雾气一样的东西遮住了。音阵录音显示，行商浪人平静而干练地下达命令，处决了那些执行了来自舰桥的愚蠢命令的船员，并下令让军械库恢复正常。三支技术小组立刻前往过热的反应堆处，士兵们负责处理弹头运输装置。一个小时后，军械库的情况恢复了正常。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンと途中で召集した士官達が武器庫に到着すると、サーヴォスカルの接眼レンズが一瞬で曇った。ヴォクス録音でわかるのは、自由開拓者が冷静かつ簡潔にコマンドを発行したこと。ブリッジから送られてきた馬鹿らしい命令を実行する責任者を処刑して、区画を整理する。3組の技術チームは直ちに過熱した原子炉へ向かい、兵士チームは弾頭輸送装置へ向かった。1時間後、状況は通常運転に戻る。
languages.original_text: When the Lord Captain and the officers {mf|he|she} gathered along the way reach the arsenal, the servo-skull's ocular lenses instantly fog over. On the vox-recording, the Rogue Trader issues commands calmly and succinctly — execute those responsible for carrying out the asinine order that came from the bridge and get the compartment sorted. The three technician teams immediately head to the overheated reactors, and the privates to the warhead transporters. An hour later, the situation is back to normal.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンと途中で召集した士官達が武器庫に到着すると、サーヴォスカルの接眼レンズが一瞬で曇った。ヴォクス録音でわかるのは、自由開拓者が冷静かつ簡潔にコマンドを発行したこと。ブリッジから送られてきた馬鹿らしい命令を実行する責任者を処刑して、区画を整理する。3組の技術チームは直ちに過熱した原子炉へ向かい、兵士チームは弾頭輸送装置へ向かった。1時間後、状況は通常運転に戻る。

languages.text: Als der Lord Captain und die unterwegs eingesammelten Offiziere das Arsenal erreichen, legt sich sofort ein Schleier über die Linsen des Servoschädels. Auf der Vox-Aufnahme sind ruhige und klare Befehle durch {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu hören – wer den unsinnigen Befehl von der Brücke ausgeführt hat, soll hingerichtet und die Abteilung muss in Ordnung gebracht werden. Drei Technikerteams eilen umgehend zu den überhitzten Reaktoren und die Rekruten zu den Transportern mit den Gefechtsköpfen. Eine Stunde später ist die Lage wieder normal.
languages.original_text: When the Lord Captain and the officers {mf|he|she} gathered along the way reach the arsenal, the servo-skull's ocular lenses instantly fog over. On the vox-recording, the Rogue Trader issues commands calmly and succinctly — execute those responsible for carrying out the asinine order that came from the bridge and get the compartment sorted. The three technician teams immediately head to the overheated reactors, and the privates to the warhead transporters. An hour later, the situation is back to normal.

languages.text: Lorsque {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} arrive à l'arsenal avec les officiers qu'{mf|il|elle} a rassemblés en chemin, la lentille oculaire du servocrâne s'embue immédiatement. Sur l'enregistrement, on entend {name} donner des ordres succincts d'une voix calme : mettre à mort ceux qui ont exécuté l'ordre insensé envoyé par le pont et réparer le compartiment. Les trois équipes de techniciens se mettent immédiatement au travail sur les réacteurs en surchauffe, tandis que les soldats s'occupent des transporteurs d'ogives. Une heure plus tard, tout est revenu à la normale.
languages.original_text: When the Lord Captain and the officers {mf|he|she} gathered along the way reach the arsenal, the servo-skull's ocular lenses instantly fog over. On the vox-recording, the Rogue Trader issues commands calmly and succinctly — execute those responsible for carrying out the asinine order that came from the bridge and get the compartment sorted. The three technician teams immediately head to the overheated reactors, and the privates to the warhead transporters. An hour later, the situation is back to normal.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} arrive à l'arsenal avec les officiers qu'{mf|il|elle} a rassemblés en chemin, la lentille oculaire du servocrâne s'embue immédiatement. Sur l'enregistrement, on entend {name} donner des ordres succincts d'une voix calme : mettre à mort ceux qui ont exécuté l'ordre insensé envoyé par le pont et réparer le module. Les trois équipes de techniciens se mettent immédiatement au travail sur les réacteurs en surchauffe, tandis que les soldats s'occupent des transporteurs d'ogives. Une heure plus tard, tout est revenu à la normale.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan ve yol boyunca topladığı subaylar cephaneliğe ulaşır ulaşmaz hizmeletin oküler mercekleri buğulanıyor. Voks kaydında, Hür Tacir'in sakin, kısa ve öz bir şekilde verdiği emirler duyuluyor. Köprüden gelen ahmakça emri yerine getirmekten sorumlu olanları idam ettiriyor ve kompartımanı düzene sokuyor. Üç teknisyen ekibi derhâl aşırı ısınan reaktörlere, erler ise savaş başlığı taşıyıcılarına gidiyor. Bir saat kadar sonra durum normale dönüyor.
languages.original_text: When the Lord Captain and the officers {mf|he|she} gathered along the way reach the arsenal, the servo-skull's ocular lenses instantly fog over. On the vox-recording, the Rogue Trader issues commands calmly and succinctly — execute those responsible for carrying out the asinine order that came from the bridge and get the compartment sorted. The three technician teams immediately head to the overheated reactors, and the privates to the warhead transporters. An hour later, the situation is back to normal.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan ve yol boyunca topladığı subaylar cephaneliğe ulaştığında, hizmeletin mercekleri anında buğulanıyor. Voks kaydında, Hür Tacir'in sakin ve öz verdiği emirler duyuluyor. Köprüden gelen ahmakça emri yerine getirmekten sorumlu olanları idam ettiriyor ve kompartımanı düzene sokuyor. Üç teknisyen ekibi derhâl aşırı ısınan reaktörlere, erler ise savaş başlığı taşıyıcılarına gidiyor. Bir saat kadar sonra durum normale dönüyor.
